title: The Kink Asylum Book 2: Medical Play, Doctor, BDSM, CNC, Dark and Taboo: A Horror Asylum Dark Romance Erotica
description: Christine wakes up from her first session with the good doctor of Richwood Asylum knowing she is his full time plaything. In Book 1 her entire life was turned upside down. Now that she belongs to the doctor, her limits will be tested.Used, examined, and owned in ways she never thought possible. Taken and exposed. Exploited.She’s put to the test with a lingering, full body examination—and this time her master’s brought another strange man as his assistant.As their BDSM medical play pushes her deeper and deeper into submissive space, she can’t deny her calling any longer. There's no way out. Punishment isn't an option.She rises to the occasion like a good girl, but can she handle them? Content is for 18+, intense medical play, rough anal, CNC, M/F/M, DP, BDSM elements. This is a dark, intense read, if that's not your cup of tea, tread with caution.
author: Elena K. Salvatore
